mapper.insert: insert into Member1(m_id, m_password, m_name, m_email, m_phone) values(#{m_id}, #{m_password}, #{m_name}, #{m_email}, #{m_phone})
mapper.select: select * from member1 where m_id=#{m_id} and m_password=#{m_password}
update member1 set m_email =#{m_email} , m_phone =#{m_phone} where m_number=#{m_number}
select m_id from member1 where m_id=#{m_id}
